item.description:
Make plans to join us for this fun after work cocktail party in Wellesley!  This Southern European restaurant, specializing in both Greek and Italian dishes, has a beautiful space in Wellesley Square where we will be relaxing!

For more info about this restaurant:
www.milestoneofwellesley.com


Directions:
From 95 or from Mass Pike, take the exit for Rte 16 West, Wellesley. Follow Rte 16W thru Wellesley Hills. Pass the Library and the LEFT turn for Rte 135 going to Needham. For 1 block Rte 135 and Rte 16 are the same road.

At the next light, Rte 16 mergers LEFT toward Sherborn. You want to stay STRAIGHT and turn RIGHT at that light into the lot for the Post Office. This is also the entrance for public parking.

Milestone is in the next block heading west. There is also ample street parking along Washington, Church and Central Streets.
item.how_to_find_us: We have reserved the back room for our June Sitz after work cocktail party!
item.name: June After Work Cocktail Party in Wellesley!
